title: Fires, Hires and Big Little Liars
itunes:title: Fires, Hires and Big Little Liars
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling bring you the latest news around the NFL including the Houston Texans firing GM Brian Gaine (5:24) and Joe Douglas being hired by the Jets. (12:50) Cam Newton has been cleared for minicamp (21:18) and the Patriots cancel the last two days of OTAs (26:19). The heroes then list some "Big Little Lies" of the NFL. (30:56)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
